for the size of the movie....
take the movie's length in minutes...
let's say 90 minutes (1 & half hour long one)

in a best-compressed encode.. for it's size.. multipy it in 2.5
90*2.5 = 225mb
ex: http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6014645/13_[2010]-R5-x264-StyLishSaLH

for normal compress encode
90*3 = 270mb
ex: http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6221224/Tangled_[2010]-BRrip-x264-StyLishSaLH
